<base target="_parent">

```{r}
tryCatch(
    plot_timeseries(
        csv_tv  = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marinebon/info-mb/master/prep/data/MBNMS_GHRSST.csv",
        title   = "Mean SST",
        y_label = "Deg C",
        skip    = 0,
        filter  = NULL,
        col_t   = "Date",
        col_y   = "Mean SST",
        group_by= NULL
    ),
    error = function(e) e
)
```
